description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Arancini With Jalapeño Mayo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Arancini With Jalapeño Mayo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine prawn, rice, parmesan, 1/4 cup flour and half the egg in a large bowl. Stir well to combine and season.
Half-fill a deep-fryer or saucepan with oil and heat to 180°C (it’s ready when a cube of bread turns golden in 30 seconds).
Meanwhile, place remaining flour, remaining egg and breadcrumbs into separate bowls. Using damp hands, firmly form rice mixture into rounds to make 18 small arancini.

Lightly coat each arancini in flour, then in egg, and then roll in breadcrumbs to coat. Deep-fry, in 3 batches, for 8 minutes or until golden brown and cooked through. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel.
Meanwhile, combine jalapeño and mayonnaise in a bowl with 2 tsp water. Season to taste and serve with arancini.
